div.p: We welcome you to Mid-Buchanan R-V School District! We are a Pre-School through Twelfth Grade building.

h1.span:
Welcome to the Mid-Buchanan R-V School District.
Proud home of the Mid-Buchanan DRAGONS!

h4.style: font-family: latobold; font-weight: normal; text-align: center;
h4.span: We are very glad you chose to visit us today, and are eager to share information about our school and staff.

We strive to live our mission and vision each and every day at Mid-Buchanan. Teachers plan lessons that are engaging and address individual student needs. Our teachers are also more than willing to provide before and after school supports for individual students or small groups. We expect
To prepare all students to become successful, productive citizens through learning each day.

br.span:
M-Motivating
B- Building
R- Respectful
V- Valuable Citizen
